pull.title: Docs: Capitalize bullet points in CONTRIBUTING guide
pull.body:
English grammar dictates that these bullet points should be capitalized.
This also makes the capitalization style consistent with the rest of the
document, e.g. the "Decision Making Process" section.

events.message:
Capitalize bullet points in CONTRIBUTING guide

English grammar dictates that these bullet points should be capitalized.
This also makes the capitalization style consistent with the rest of the
document, e.g. the "Decision Making Process" section.

events.body: @promag Thanks for the feedback. I've undone the trailing whitespace cleanup at the end of the file, and also updated the bullet point you pointed out in `test/functional/README.md`.
